description:
With our main office in Savannah, Georgia, The Eichholz Law Firm, P.C., represents those victimized by the negligent and wrongful acts of others. Our law firm proudly serves clients from throughout the Savannah metropolitan area, Chatham and Bryan counties, and Coastal Georgia with high-quality counsel in the following practice areas:

•         Personal injury and auto accidents

•         Workers' compensation

•         Consumer safety law

•         Product liability

•         Dangerous drugs

•         Nursing home abuse

At our law firm, we understand the importance of choosing the right personal injury lawyer. With over 37 years of experience, we have the knowledge and the resources to handle any client's case, and we are devoted to providing top-quality legal services to maximize results. With a passion for justice, our attorneys aggressively assert our clients' rights and work to obtain the compensation they need. Over the years, we have secured millions of dollars in settlements and awards, and we are proud of our success.

If you or someone you love has suffered injury in an accident that was the fault of someone else, or if you are the surviving relative of a victim of a wrongful death, you can rely on our law firm to provide the guidance and counsel you need during your traumatic time. If you are battling with an insurance provider or the government for benefits, we will fight on your behalf so you get the restitution to which you are entitled.

Regardless of your injury or loss, you do not have to suffer alone. The attorneys at The Eichholz Law Firm, P.C., are here to advocate for you, so you can focus on your recovery and rebuilding your life. For more information about how our law firm can help you, contact our office for a free initial consultation.
